achievements: Author of *In Search of Lost Time*, considered one of the greatest works of 20th-century literature
Known for his exploration of themes like memory, time, and consciousness
Pioneer of Dadaism and conceptual art
Famous for works like *Nude Descending a Staircase* and *Fountain*
Considered one of the greatest mimes of all time
Developed a distinctive style characterized by white face paint and black attire
Known for his character Bip the Clown
